channel.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
channel.description:
Hello i having a trubel whit a client well all clients.
#ok i was wondering if some 1 could help me whit it i have java, and i cant compile why cant i do that + can some 1 plzz tell me a good server + client that i can start whit i have a pready good now but ... well plzz help me as fast ass possible
i have windows 7 to

item.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
item.dc:creator: @balieboy balieboy
item.description:
@balieboy wrote:

ok i changed that but when i try to start it now this come

ECHO är i läge ON.

C:\Users\Charlie\Desktop\Pr0digyScape Server Files\Pr0digyScape-Server Files\Pr0
digyscape Client\Pr0digyscape Client>offjavac *java
offjavac is not an internal command, external command,
program or batch file.

C:\Users\Charlie\Desktop\Pr0digyScape Server Files\Pr0digyScape-Server Files\Pr0
digyscape Client\Pr0digyscape Client>pause
press any key to continue…

Read full topic
item.source: My client start then quit in 1 sec

item.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“Zanzibar, post:6, topic:330258”]@echo off javac *java pause

If that doesn’t work it means he doesn’t have environmental variables set up, not that he doesn’t have Java.

If this doesn’t work, you do not have Java installed .[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

balieboy:

thats the problem my jdk i cant install it its an error i think its that and should my server look like this??

Well there’s your problem.
No JDK, no server. Quite simple really.

item.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

@echo off javac *java pause

If this doesn’t work, you do not have Java installed .

item.description:

thats the problem my jdk i cant install it its an error i think its that and should my server look like this??

@echo off
title Pr0digyScape Client
java -Xmx500m -cp .;./bin; EGUI
exit

well its the client

item.source: My client start then quit in 1 sec

item.title: My client start then quit in 1 sec
item.dc:creator: @chocothunda chocothunda
item.description:
@chocothunda wrote:

Replace your current compiler with this:

@echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic
